product_name: Genuine Innovations DLX Tire Repair Kit with UltraFlate Plus CO2 Tire Inflator
long_description: Get everything you need to fix a flat and start riding again with the DLX Tire Repair kit, which includes an UltraFlate Plus CO2 tire inflator as well as CO2 cartridges, levers and patches.
short_description: Get everything you need to fix a flat and start riding again with the DLX Tire Repair kit, which includes an UltraFlate Plus CO2 tire inflator as well as CO2 cartridges, levers and patches.
